topic.title: Website Headers, Footers, Lists and Navigation Bar
topic.section:
Conference Homepage Header. For conference homepage, conference title either as text or as image, and conference logo can be added.

Website Header. Conference title either as text or as image, and conference logo, or HTML version of the header, added for conference web site will appear throughout conference site.

Website Footer. Footer added for conference web site will appear throughout conference site.

Lists. Number of items and number of page links that appear on a page can be specified. It will determine how many items will be listed on a single page, and how many page links are numbered and shown on a page, with more others expanded by clicking.
